entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late this morning then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
